name: Life and Debt: A Real Life Simulator
description: Life & Debt: A Real Life Simulator is a 2D pixel art life management simulator. Life & Debt focuses on the beginnings of new home ownership after moving out of your parents' house. You will have to maintain your finances and cashflow while having a really bad shopping addiction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2) or later Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or equivalent Storage: 250 MB available space
